item.title: FT Most Read: Friday, September 13, 2024 at 7:15 AM UTC
item.description:
1. Berkshire vice-chair Jain sells more than half of his stake in company
2. Trumpâ€™s camp reels after debate injects new doubt into re-election bid
3. Gary Stevenson claims to have been the best trader in the world. His old colleagues disagree
4. US Navy Seal unit that killed bin Laden trains for China invasion of Taiwan
5. Donald Trump rules out another US presidential debate
